text: Daud Kamal (1935-1987) was a Pakistani poet and academic, from Peshawar city. He was a Professor of English Literature at University of Peshawar.[ http://tribune.com.pk/story/641733/celebrating-the-unsung-after-the- carnations-wither/ Article Tribune, Pakistan 5th December 2013] ==References== Category:1935 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Pakistani poets Category:People from Peshawar Category:Pakistani academics
title: Daud Kamal
